janadhipathiwaranaya jayaganimen pasuwa mahinda rajapaksha wisin aarakshaka amathyanshaye lekam dhurayata gotabhaya rajapaksha pathkaranu labuwe 2005 nowambar masayediya. 2006 desambar masayedi gotabhaya rajapaksha gaman gath rathaya ilakka kara kolambaa piththala handiyedi eltitiee sanwidhanaya maragena marena praharayak ella kala athara in ohuge jiwithayata haniyak nowiya. 2009 mayi 19 weni dina eltitieeya yudamaya washayen parajayata path wimen pasu dakune sinhala bahutharaya athara gotabhaya rajapaksha kapi penena charithayak washayen mathu wiya.
